text: , son of Iemoto, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Kamakura period (1185–1333). He did not hold regent positions kampaku and sessho. Mototsugu was his son. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1287 births Category:1318 deaths Category:People of Kamakura-period Japan
title: Konoe Tsunehira
